message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of the significant return on investment you'll see.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this price is more reasonable considering its worth to me.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I'm confident in the value this product brings, I'm willing to adjust my price to $1,050,000. This offer represents a significant discount from my initial asking price and reflects my desire to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1,025,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from it.
